page.title: 11FASHION IN STANFORD LE HOPE
page.content: In Stanford and Corringham there are many fashion-conscious people.Fashion ranges from the outrageous dress of Punks in their tartan trousers decorated in chains,Dr.Martin boots, studded belts and wrist bands and their multi-coloured spiked hair,to the less conspicuous fashion conscious teenagers whose dress style is continually changing.Pop stars and television personalities have a big influence on the way we dress.Pop groups like Duran Duran and Spandau Ballet brought with them the New Romantic movement.Both sexes were wearing frilly shirts and blouses with scarves round their necks and big baggy trousers with ankle boots.Facial appearance was very important during this phase and everyone wore make-up with their hair short at the back and a long fringe that fell into one eye.
